cn: 以下英文句子来自于学术文章的Latex源文件中，请检查这些句子的语法和拼写是否正确，如果有错误，首先以中文指出错误并说明如何纠正（每个错误一行），然后给出正确的英文版本；如果没有错误，就说'语法没有错误'；同时，请阅读这个句子，看看它在语义上是否正确，前后逻辑是否连贯，如果有错误，首先以中文指出错误并说明如何纠正（每个错误一行），然后给出正确的英文版本；如果没有错误，就说'语义没有错误'：
Please translate following sentences to English in academic style:
翻译成英文，如果有代码就以```包围，没有就不包围：
en: Below is a paragraph from an academic paper. Polish the writing to meet the academic style, improve the spelling, grammar, clarity, concision and overall readability. When necessary, rewrite the whole sentence:
Suggest some improvement version or strong version in rebuttal:
Please write an academic paragraph in academic style based on the following description:
Expand these words to whole sentences:
Here are some bibliography items, please transform them into bibtex style. Note that, reference styles maybe more than one kind, you should transform each item correctly:
